body_content.explanation: If two people or ideas are diametrical opposites, they are as different as possible:
examples: This is the diametrical opposite of what most people would say.
The proposed changes are in almost diametrical opposition to those we asked for.

body_content.explanation: relating to the diameter of something (= a straight line that goes from one side of a round shape or object, through the centre point, to the opposite edge):
examples: The Petri dishes had diametrical lines drawn on the bottom to identify the centre of the plate.
The growth of the fungus was recorded as the mean of measurements along two diametrical axes.
